alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 4:25PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Coconino County through 515 PM MST... At 423 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Grand Canyon National Park, or 20 miles south of the Village of Supai, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Grand Canyon National Park, Supai and Havasupai Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau
